pinyin: hong2 xue4 qiu2 sheng1 cheng2 su4

sentences.english: The mutation means that Duffy receptor proteins are not made in red cells.
sentences.chinese: 變異意味着趨化因子的蛋白質不再由紅血球製造產生。

sentences.english: The above-normal red cell concentration produces an almost complete cessation of erythropoiesis .
sentences.chinese: 上述正常紅細胞濃度使得紅血球生成幾乎完全停止。

sentences.english: So does cause synesthesia high red blood cell count and heart attack?
sentences.chinese: 那到底是什麼造成了共感覺高紅血球細胞和心臟病發？

sentences.english: Eventually, Corexit also ruptures red blood cells causing internal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 最終地，Corexit亦破裂紅血球造成內出血。

sentences.english: It's no wonder that I have always been fascinated by red blood cells, or erythrocytes.
sentences.chinese: 經常和血液打交道，使我對紅血球很着迷。

sentences.english: So, red blood cells of most African people do not express the Duffy blood-group protein.
sentences.chinese: 大部分非洲人的紅血球不會表型爲杜菲血型蛋白。

sentences.english: Scintigraphy with Technetium-labeled red blood cells showed jejunal bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 同位素紅血球掃描發現空腸處出血。

sentences.english: A low concentration of oxygen-carrying red cells robs the body of energy-releasing oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 攜氧紅血球數量少會使肌體失去釋放能量的氧氣。

sentences.english: Malaria parasites multiply rapidly in the liver and then in red blood cells of the infected person.
sentences.chinese: 瘧原蟲在肝臟和隨後在被感染者的紅血球中迅速繁殖。

sentences.english: A lack of vitamin B12, found only in animal sources, can seriously interfere with the production of red blood cells in the bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏維生素B12會嚴重干擾骨髓中紅血球的增加。

definition: to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
